profile.profileName: [Brooklyn Navy Yard Archives, Brooklyn, NY] Regional archive
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for mixed format archival collections that focuses on Georeferencing

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item or place.

label.name: Creation date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with the creation of the resource.

label.name: Acquisition date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with the acquisition of the resource.

label.name: File location
label.description: Location of file.

label.name: Dimensions
label.description: Physical dimensions of object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Administrative Notes
label.description: Enter any administrative notes about or related to the asset, entity, or collection being described.

label.name: Condition
label.description: Describe the condition of the asset.

label.name: Discipline Type
label.description: Select the appropriate discipline for the asset being described.

label.name: Plan Type
label.description: Select the appropriate plan type for the asset being described.

label.name: Draftsperson
label.description: Signed name of draftsperson.

label.name: Naval Class
label.description: Select the appropriate Naval Classification Type and enter the number.

label.name: Provenance
label.description: Describe relevant provenance information for the asset.

label.name: Cancellation date
label.description: Note the cancellation date stamped on the postcard

label.name: Location received
label.description: Note the location where the postcard was received.

label.name: Recipient
label.description: Note the recipient of the postcard.

label.name: Sender
label.description: Note the sender of the postcard.

label.name: Location sent
label.description: Note the location where the postcard was sent.

label.name: Publisher
label.description: The publisher of the postcard.

label.name: Correspondence
label.description: Note any correspondence at written on the postcard.

label.name: Publication name
label.description: Note the name of the publication from where the clipping was originally printed.

label.name: Publication information
label.description: Note the volume, issue, and page number for the clipping.

label.name: Document type
label.description: Select the type of document being described.

label.name: ISBNs
label.description: ISBN numbers (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Series
label.description: Series information (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Source
label.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

label.name: Language
label.description: Language/s of the document being described (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Original language
label.description: The original language of the document being described (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: LCC
label.description: Library of Congress Classification (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: DDC
label.description: Dewey Decimal Classification (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Tags
label.description: Tags and Keywords that describe the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Review
label.description: Reviews that describe the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Summary
label.description: Summary that describes the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Comments
label.description: Comments about the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Private comments
label.description: Private comments about the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Copies available
label.description: Number of copies available for the document (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Encoding
label.description: Encoding information (legacy metadata from LibraryThing)

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format or physical medium or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Historical event type
label.description: Select the type of historical event being recorded.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.
